Protected Overridable Function MeasureCore (availableSize As Size) As Size
abstract member MeasureCore : System.Windows.Size -> System.Windows.Size override this.MeasureCore : System.Windows.Size -> System.Windows.Size

param.name: availableSize
param.span: 父元素可以为子元素分配的可用大小。

span.span: The available size that the parent element can allocate for the child.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，提供测量逻辑来适当地调整此元素的大小，兼顾任何子元素内容的大小。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides measurement logic for sizing this element properly, with consideration of the size of any child element content.

returns.span: 此元素在布局中的所需大小。

span.span: The desired size of this element in layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从而不是派生元素更常见。It is more common to derive an element from rather than . 如果是从派生的, 请注意, 上的重写会密封方法。If you are deriving from , note that an override of on seals the method. 因此, 如果通过不包括的继承派生, 则只会重写为更改布局度量值特性的方法。Therefore, you only override as a means to alter layout measure characteristics if you derive from through an inheritance that does not include . 如果尝试在核心级别上构建自己的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]实现, 则可能会出现这种情况。This might be the case if you are attempting to build your own implementation on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core-level. 否则, 如果您是从派生的, 则度量值行为的实现模板为的实现。Otherwise, if you are deriving from , then the implementation template for Measure behavior is the implementation of .. 具有子元素的父元素必须在每个子元素上调用, 否则这些子元素不会调整大小或排列, 并且将从布局中有效地消失。A parent element with child elements must call on each child, otherwise these child elements are not sized or arranged and will effectively disappear from layout. ## Examples 的典型重写遵循此大致模式 (不存在名`VisualChildren`为的内置集合;`VisualChildren`表示元素所维护的任何子集合的占位符。A typical override of follows this approximate pattern (there is not a built-in collection called `VisualChildren`; `VisualChildren` is a placeholder that represents whatever child collection your element maintains). [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementmeasureoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementmeasureoverride)] - 必须对每个子元素调用。You must call on each child element. - 通常, 实现应在同一元素中的和方法调用之间缓存度量信息。Generally, your implementation should cache measurement information between the and method calls in the same element. - 不需要调用的基实现, 但如果基实现提供所需的布局功能, 则可能是合适的。Calling base implementations of is not required, but might be appropriate if the base implementation provides a desired layout capability. - 对子元素的调用应传递与父元素`availableSize`相同的, 或传递区域的子集, 具体取决于父元素支持的布局类型。 Calls to on child elements should pass either the same `availableSize` as the parent, or a subset of the area, depending on the type of layout the parent element supports. 例如, 删除特定于元素的边框或填充、滚动条或自定义控件的区域是有效的。For example, it would be valid to remove the area for an element-specific border or padding, a scrollbar, or a custom control.

para.span: 实现必须能够处理为无限期提供的值。

span.span: Implementations must be able to process a value provided for that is infinite.

para.span: 无限值指示没有请求的约束, 并通过递归度量值将度量选择有效地推迟到父元素。

span.span: An infinite value indicates no requested constraints, and effectively defers measurement choice to the parent element, through recursive Measure calls.

para.span: 实现可将提供的值视为软约束。

span.span: Implementations can consider the value provided for to be a soft constraint.

para.span: 即使应用程序代码的其他方面能够确定父元素的当前实际大小, 子元素也可能会指定更大的大小。

span.span: The child element might specify a larger size, even if other aspects of application code were able to determine the current actual size of the parent element.

para.span: 大大小请求是一种约定, 指示子元素正在查询父元素是否可以支持内容显示区域内的内容滚动。

span.span: The large size request is a convention that indicates that the child element is querying whether your parent element can support content scrolling within a content display region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下任意鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常与或一起引发, 这对应于按下这两个标准鼠标按钮之一。 The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由事件, 但它们是直接路由事件, 当事件沿事件路由到达此元素时, 将引发相应的按钮特定的事件。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅或 的 "备注"。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控件可能具有鼠标按钮事件的固有类处理。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 鼠标左键按下事件是在控件中具有类处理的最可能的事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 类处理通常将基础类事件标记为已处理。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 将该事件标记为已处理后, 通常不会引发附加到该元素的其他实例处理程序。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发在冒泡方向上沿 UI 树中的根向下附加到元素的任何其他类或实例处理程序。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以通过使用以下任一解决方案解决在具有类处理的派生类上的 "上一重要" 和 "接收鼠标左键按下事件" 事件中所述的问题:You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 为事件附加处理程序, 这些处理程序未标记为由控件处理。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意, 因为这是预览事件, 所以路由从根节点开始, 向下隧道到控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 通过调用并选择允许处理程序侦听事件的签名选项 (即使它们已在路由事件数据中标记为已处理), 在控件过程上注册处理程序。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseEnter As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针进入此元素的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是使用直接事件处理路由策略的[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。 is a [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由事件不沿路由引发;相反, 它们是在引发它们的同一元素中进行处理的。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是, 它们会启用路由事件行为的其他方面, 如样式中的事件触发器。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管跟踪鼠标指针进入元素边界的时间, 但此事件更确切地报告此元素的属性值已从`false`更改为`true` 。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 当按钮有焦点且按下的键为空间条时, (或任何派生类)对事件具有本机处理。A (or any derived class) has native handling for a event when the button has focus, and the pressed key is the space bar. 本机处理会将按钮作为源来引发事件, 并捕获鼠标, 即使鼠标指针看上去没有移动也是如此。The native handling raises the event with the button as the source, and also captures the mouse, even though the mouse pointer does not appear to move. 鼠标捕获后, 还会用按钮作为源来引发事件。As a result of the mouse capture, a event is also raised with the button as the source. 通常情况下, 如果元素捕获鼠标, 则会引发, 还会引发其他特定于控件的事件。In general, if an element captures the mouse, then is raised, as well as and possibly other control-specific events. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎会在元素树中跟随冒泡路由, 但实际上它是直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开基础事件的事件数据。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果标记为 "已处理", 则实质上是为沿着路由的所有其他侦听器以及所有相关事件标记已处理。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成的事件, 例如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制类可能具有鼠标按钮事件的固有类处理。Some control classes might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 鼠标左键按下事件是在控件中具有类处理的最可能的事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 类处理通常将基础类事件标记为已处理。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 将该事件标记为已处理后, 通常不会引发附加到该元素的其他实例处理程序。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发在冒泡方向上沿 UI 树中的根向下附加到元素的任何其他类或实例处理程序。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以通过使用以下任一解决方案解决在具有类处理的派生类上的 "上一重要" 和 "接收鼠标左键按下事件" 事件中所述的问题:You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 为事件附加处理程序, 这些处理程序未标记为由控件处理。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意, 因为这是预览事件, 所以路由从根节点开始, 向下隧道到控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 通过调用并选择允许处理程序侦听事件的签名选项 (即使它们已在路由事件数据中标记为已处理), 在控件过程上注册处理程序。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎会在元素树中跟随冒泡路由, 但实际上它是直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开基础事件的事件数据。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果标记为 "已处理", 则实质上是为沿着路由的所有其他侦听器以及所有相关事件标记已处理。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎会在元素树中跟随冒泡路由, 但实际上它是直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开基础事件的事件数据。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果标记为 "已处理", 则实质上是为沿着路由的所有其他侦听器以及所有相关事件标记已处理。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成的事件, 例如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . 鼠标右键事件通常在应用程序方案中具有本机处理。Right button mouse events frequently have native handling in application scenarios. 例如, 按下鼠标右键可能会显示上下文菜单。For instance, a right mouse button down might display a context menu. 请参阅[ContextMenu 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md)。See [ContextMenu Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常与或一起引发, 这对应于两个标准鼠标按钮之一的版本。 The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由事件, 但它们是直接路由事件, 当事件沿事件路由到达此元素时, 将引发相应的按钮特定的事件。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅或 的 "备注"。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于鼠标指针所在的位置;因此, 如果从焦点或捕获的元素接收事件, 则鼠标指针实际上可能位于另一个元素上。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Overridable Function MoveFocus (request As TraversalRequest) As Boolean
abstract member MoveFocus : System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest -> bool override this.MoveFocus : System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest -> bool

param.name: request
param.span: 一个遍历请求，其中包含一个属性，该属性指示以现有 Tab 键顺序遍历的模式或视觉移动的方向。

span.span: A traversal request, which contains a property that indicates either a mode to traverse in existing tab order, or a direction to move visually.

summary.span: 尝试将焦点从此元素移到其他元素。

span.span: Attempts to move focus from this element to another element.

summary.span: 移动焦点的方向由指导方向指定，该方向在此元素的可视父级的组织结构中解释。

span.span: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.

returns.span: 如果执行了请求的遍历，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请确保选中此方法的返回值。Make sure you check the return value of this method. 如果遍历运行到`false`由控件的组合定义的制表位, 并且遍历请求未请求换行, 则可能会返回的返回值。A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAccessKey(class System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAccessKey (e As AccessKeyEventArgs)
abstract member OnAccessKey : System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs -> unit override this.OnAccessKey : System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 访问键事件的事件数据。

span.span: The event data to the access key event.

param.span: 事件数据报告哪个键被调用，并指示控制发送这些事件的 对象是否也将此访问键调用发送到其他元素。

span.span: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.

summary.span: 在调用对于此元素有意义的访问键时提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类或其他地方没有实际的 AccessKey 事件, 您可以引发或附加的处理程序。There is no actual AccessKey event in the class, or elsewhere, which you can raise or attach handlers for. 相反, 该事件是通过一个专用的管理器类产生的, 后者将对所有输入进行后处理, 以搜索适用于整个输入模型的访问密钥。Instead, the event is originated via a dedicated manager class, , which post-processes all input to search for access keys that are applicable to the entire input model.

para.span: 此方法的默认实现将键盘焦点设置到此元素 (通过调用)。

span.span: The default implementation of this method in sets keyboard focus to this element (by calling ).

para.span: 如果实现可获得焦点, 则实现应保持此行为, 因为它是辅助功能方案的预期行为。

span.span: Implementations should perpetuate this behavior if they are focusable, because it is an expected behavior for accessibility scenarios.

para.span: 请注意, 基实现对传递的事件数据不执行任何操作, 并且不会引发进一步的事件;它只是设置焦点。

span.span: Note that the base implementation does nothing with the passed event data and raises no further event; it just sets the focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChildDesiredSizeChanged(class System.Windows.UIElement child) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnChildDesiredSizeChanged (child As UIElement)
abstract member OnChildDesiredSizeChanged : System.Windows.UIElement -> unit override this.OnChildDesiredSizeChanged : System.Windows.UIElement -> unit

param.name: child
param.span: 重新调整其大小的子元素。

span.span: The child element that is being resized.

summary.span: 重新调整子元素的大小时支持布局行为。

span.span: Supports layout behavior when a child element is resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常不由应用程序代码调用。This method is typically not called by your application code. 它是公开的, 因此派生元素类可以对其自身可能无效的布局状态进行进一步检查。It is exposed so that derived element classes can make further checks on their own possibly invalid layout state. 类还可以尝试进行优化, 以根据对子元素的大小更改, 最大程度地减少布局传递的处理时间。Classes could also attempt optimizations to minimize the processing time for a layout pass based on size changes to child elements. 实现的派生元素类示例是控件。An example derived element class that implements is the control.

para.span: 方法具有对其自身调用的默认实现。

span.span: The method has the default implementation of calling on itself.

para.span: 典型的实现应为: 执行你自己的元素支持的任何优化, 然后通常从至少一个代码分支 (表示每个你自己的度量值缓存逻辑的 "已更新" 状态的项) 调用基类。

span.span: A typical implementation would be: do whatever optimization your own element supports, and then typically call base from at least one of the code branches (the one that indicated "dirty" state per your own measure caching logic).

para.span: 如果此方法是产生大小更改的子本身, 则仅在布局处理中调用此方法。

span.span: This method is only called in the layout processing if it was the child itself that originated the size changes.

para.span: 否则, 如果父元素根据布局系统规则启动了 pass, 则父元素已经重新计算布局。

span.span: Otherwise, if the parent element initiates the pass, according to the layout system rules, the parent is recalculating layout already.

para.span: 布局系统将按子对象到父级的顺序处理布局, 因此不需要从子元素布局调用返回到父元素大小调整。

span.span: The layout system processes layout in the order of child-to-parent, so no return to parent element sizing from the child element layout calls is necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer OnCreateAutomationPeer() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnCreateAutomationPeer () As AutomationPeer
abstract member OnCreateAutomationPeer : unit -> System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer override this.OnCreateAutomationPeer : unit -> System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer

summary.span: 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构返回特定于类的 实现。

span.span: Returns class-specific implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

returns.span: 特定于类型的 实现。

span.span: The type-specific implementation.

para.span: 此方法的实现通常是调用特定实现的构造函数, 并将其作为返回值返回。

span.span: The implementation of this method is typically to call the constructor of a specific implementation, and return it as the return value.

para.span: 所有派生类都应该实现此方法以便向[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构提供自己的特定实现。

span.span: All derived classes should implement this method in order to provide their own specific implementations to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

para.span: 有关实现此模式的详细信息, 请参阅。

span.span: For details on implementing this pattern, see .

Protected Overridable Sub OnDragEnter (e As DragEventArgs)

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 附加事件到达派生自此类的其路由中的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDragLeave(class System.Windows.DragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)
abstract member OnDragLeave : System.Windows.DragEventArgs -> unit override this.OnDragLeave : System.Windows.DragEventArgs -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: e

span.span: A that contains event data.

param.span: 此事件数据必须包含 事件的标识符。

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件数据引发 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然虚拟, 但这种方法具有引发事件的默认实现。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 此 On \* 方法实现旨在引发事件, 并在内部调用此相同的方法实现, 以在属性值更改时引发事件。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 实现不同于其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]某些 On \* 实现, 后者仅提供一种方便的方法来为该事件添加类处理。 The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有意且异常地需要不引发焦点事件, 否则请确保您的实现调用基实现。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否则, 在通常将焦点设置到此元素的典型用户操作期间, 不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果不想让元素获得可设定焦点的元素, 则可以通过将设置为来防止元素获得焦点。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当依赖项属性的值更改时, 将引发此虚方法。This virtual method is raised when the value of the dependency property changes. 首先引发虚方法, 并在必要时对事件数据进行操作。The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 然后, 将用相同的事件数据实例引发该事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 请注意, 该事件不是路由事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此, 不能在类处理程序中将其标记为已处理。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 击键由专用的输入管理器处理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖于击键的其他编程功能 (例如, 输入和命令绑定) 可能会处理击键, 然后将其作为一般击键公开。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理, 则不会调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

span.span: A that contains event data.

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用提供的事件数据引发 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data that is provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然虚拟, 但这种方法具有引发事件的默认实现。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 此 On \* 方法实现旨在引发事件, 并在内部调用此相同的方法实现, 以在属性值更改时引发事件。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 此实现与其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]一些 On \* 实现不同, 后者仅提供一种方便的方法来为该事件添加类处理。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有意且异常地需要不引发焦点事件, 否则请确保您的实现调用基实现。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否则, 在通常将焦点设置到此元素的典型用户操作期间, 不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果不想让元素获得可设定焦点的元素, 则可以通过将设置为来防止元素获得焦点。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标按钮操作也由专用的输入管理器进行处理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖于鼠标按钮操作的其他编程功能 (如输入和命令绑定) 可能会调用操作的处理程序, 然后才能将其作为常规鼠标按钮操作公开。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理, 则不会调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将事件标记为已处理, 则可能会影响以下事件: 和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 收到时 , 可能会在接收元素上引发这些事件中的任何一个。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果将此事件标记为 "在类处理中处理", 则仍会引发 subevents;但是, 它们将在事件数据中传递已处理状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件, 则不会调用 subevents 的实例处理程序, 除非您显式`handledEventsToo`使用 with `true`以便附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会被调用, 除非这些类处理程序已注册`handledEventsToo`到`true`签名。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理, 你可以保证类处理对所有可能的鼠标按钮按下操作都适用。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行为可能不是必需的;因此, 使用此虚方法将事件标记为已处理时, 请谨慎使用。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个特定于按钮的直接事件还具有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;考虑是否可以更适当地重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件, 其中包含直接路由策略。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 将事件标记为已处理仍适用于阻止调用典型的实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来像是以冒泡路线旅行, 但实际以间接方式传播。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是进行冒泡路由的基础事件, 每个事件路由沿事件路由都使用相同的处理来引发直接路由事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 虽然您可以将事件标记为已处理, 以便进行此元素, 但已处理状态并不保持事件路由中的其他元素。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是, 你可能需要将事件标记为已处理, 以防止调用常规实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 中的常规鼠标事件处理的默认实现将侦听并将其转换为适当的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果要重写此逻辑, 必须创建派生类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中, 为注册替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 不能通过重写来更改的鼠标处理行为。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者, 您可以重写此方法, 以便为特定的鼠标状态更改事件处理。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 是否选择调用基实现取决于方案。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 如果无法调用 base, 将禁用对也需要调用的上级类上的鼠标事件的默认输入处理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如, 你可以 在派生类中派生, 而不调用基实现; 但是 , 此重写将禁用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来像是以冒泡路线旅行, 但实际以间接方式传播。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是进行冒泡路由的基础事件, 每个事件路由沿事件路由都使用相同的处理来引发直接路由事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 虽然您可以将事件标记为已处理, 以便进行此元素, 但已处理状态并不保持事件路由中的其他元素。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是, 你可能需要将事件标记为已处理, 以防止调用常规实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 中的常规鼠标事件处理的默认实现将侦听并将其转换为适当的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果要重写此逻辑, 必须创建派生类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中, 为注册替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 不能通过重写来更改的鼠标处理行为。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding .

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来像是以冒泡路线旅行, 但实际以间接方式传播。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是进行冒泡路由的基础事件, 每个事件路由沿事件路由都使用相同的处理来引发直接路由事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 虽然您可以将事件标记为已处理, 以便进行此元素, 但已处理状态并不保持事件路由中的其他元素。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是, 你可能需要将事件标记为已处理, 以防止调用常规实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 中的常规鼠标事件处理的默认实现将侦听并将其转换为适当的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果要重写此逻辑, 必须创建派生类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中, 为注册替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 不能通过重写来更改的鼠标处理行为。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者, 您可以重写此方法, 以便为特定的鼠标状态更改事件处理。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 是否选择调用基实现取决于方案。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 如果无法调用 base, 将禁用对也需要调用的上级类上的鼠标事件的默认输入处理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如, 你可以在派生类中派生 , 而在不调用 base 的情况下进行重写; 但是, 此替代禁用控件上的上下文菜单服务, 这是默认行为的一部分。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标按钮操作也由专用的输入管理器进行处理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖于鼠标按钮操作的其他编程功能 (如输入和命令绑定) 可能会调用操作的处理程序, 然后才能将其作为常规鼠标按钮操作公开。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理, 则不会调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将事件标记为已处理, 则可能会影响以下事件: 和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 收到时 , 可能会在接收元素上引发这些事件中的任何一个。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果将此事件标记为 "在类处理中处理", 则仍会引发 subevents;但是, 它们将在事件数据中传递已处理状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件, 则不会调用 subevents 的实例处理程序, 除非您显式`handledEventsToo`使用 with `true`以便附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会被调用, 除非这些类处理程序已注册`handledEventsToo`到`true`签名。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理, 可以确保类处理对所有可能的鼠标按钮向上操作都进行处理。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行为可能不是必需的;因此, 使用此虚方法将事件标记为已处理时, 请谨慎使用。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个特定于按钮的直接事件还具有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;考虑是否可以更适当地重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

Protected Overridable Sub OnPreviewDrop (e As DragEventArgs)

param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 事件数据报告称已按下一个或多个鼠标按钮。

span.span: The event data reports that one or more mouse buttons were pressed.

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 附加路由事件在其路由中到达派生自此类的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标按钮操作也由专用的输入管理器进行处理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖于鼠标按钮操作的其他编程功能 (如输入和命令绑定) 可能会调用操作的处理程序, 然后才能将其作为常规鼠标按钮操作公开。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理, 则不会调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将事件标记为已处理, 则可能会影响以下事件: 和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 收到时 , 可能会在接收元素上引发这些事件中的任何一个。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果将此事件标记为 "在类处理中处理", 则仍会引发 subevents;但是, 它们将在事件数据中传递已处理状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件, 则不会调用 subevents 的实例处理程序, 除非您显式`handledEventsToo`使用 with `true`以便附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会被调用, 除非这些类处理程序已注册`handledEventsToo`到`true`签名。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理, 你可以保证类处理对所有可能的鼠标按钮按下操作都适用。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行为可能不是必需的;因此, 使用此虚方法将事件标记为已处理时, 请谨慎使用。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个特定于按钮的直接事件还具有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;考虑是否可以更适当地重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来是传递隧道路由, 但实际以间接方式传播。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是隧道路由的基础事件, 每个事件路由沿事件路由都使用相同的处理来引发直接路由事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 虽然您可以将事件标记为已处理, 以便进行此元素, 但已处理状态并不保持事件路由中的其他元素。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是, 你可能需要将事件标记为已处理, 以防止调用常规实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 中的常规鼠标事件处理的默认实现将侦听并将其转换为适当的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果要重写此逻辑, 必须创建派生类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中, 为注册替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 不能通过重写来更改的鼠标处理行为。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者, 您可以重写此方法, 以便为特定的鼠标状态更改事件处理。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 是否选择调用基实现取决于方案。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 如果无法调用 base, 将禁用对也需要调用的上级类上的鼠标事件的默认输入处理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如, 你可以 在派生类中派生, 而不调用基实现; 但是 , 此重写将禁用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来是传递隧道路由, 但实际以间接方式传播。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是隧道路由的基础事件, 每个事件路由沿事件路由都使用相同的处理来引发直接路由事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 虽然您可以将事件标记为已处理, 以便进行此元素, 但已处理状态并不保持事件路由中的其他元素。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是, 你可能需要将事件标记为已处理, 以防止调用常规实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 中的常规鼠标事件处理的默认实现将侦听并将其转换为适当的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果要重写此逻辑, 必须创建派生类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中, 为注册替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 不能通过重写来更改的鼠标处理行为。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding .

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标按钮操作也由专用的输入管理器进行处理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖于鼠标按钮操作的其他编程功能 (如输入和命令绑定) 可能会调用操作的处理程序, 然后才能将其作为常规鼠标按钮操作公开。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理, 则不会调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将事件标记为已处理, 则可能会影响以下事件: 和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 收到时 , 可能会在接收元素上引发这些事件中的任何一个。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果将此事件标记为 "在类处理中处理", 则仍会引发 subevents;但是, 它们将在事件数据中传递已处理状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件, 则不会调用 subevents 的实例处理程序, 除非您显式`handledEventsToo`使用 with `true`以便附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会被调用, 除非这些类处理程序已注册`handledEventsToo`到`true`签名。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理, 可以确保类处理对所有可能的鼠标按钮向上操作都进行处理。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行为可能不是必需的;因此, 使用此虚方法将事件标记为已处理时, 请谨慎使用。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个特定于按钮的直接事件还具有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;考虑是否可以更适当地重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 附加事件到达派生自此类的其路由中的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

param.name: drawingContext

span.span: The drawing instructions for a specific element.

param.span: 此上下文是为布局系统提供的。

span.span: This context is provided to the layout system.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，会参与由布局系统控制的呈现操作。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 调用此方法时，不直接使用此元素的呈现指令，而是将其保留供布局和绘制在以后异步使用。

span.span: The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在类中没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation in the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示面板派生类的可能实现。The following code example shows a possible implementation for a panel derived class. [!code-csharp[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/CSharp/OffsetPanel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/visualbasic/offsetpanel.vb#1)]

para.span: 可以重写方法, 以将更多图形元素 (之前未在逻辑树中定义) 添加到呈现的元素 (如效果或装饰器)。

span.span: The method can be overridden to add further graphical elements (not previously defined in a logical tree) to a rendered element, such as effects or adorners.

para.span: 对象作为参数传递, 该参数提供用于绘制形状、文本、图像或视频的方法。

span.span: A object is passed as an argument, which provides methods for drawing shapes, text, images or videos.

param.name: info
param.span: 打包的参数 ()，其中包括新旧大小，其尺寸实际上发生了改变。

span.span: The packaged parameters (), which includes old and new sizes, and which dimension actually changes.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，会参与由布局系统控制的呈现操作。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 如果元素的 已因布局更新而更改，则在布局更新之后以及呈现之前调用此方法。

span.span: This method is invoked after layout update, and before rendering, if the element's has changed as a result of layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 典型的 WPF 框架级别元素使用重写实现。A typical WPF framework-level element uses the override implementation from . 实现会使和属性失效, 并处理重塑布局的基本知识。 The implementation invalidates the and properties and handles the basics of remaking the layout. 在级别重写意味着元素实现特意不使用 WPF 框架级别的实现, 因此, 你的元素必须更直接处理布局逻辑, 通常通过编写替换布局系统。Overriding at the level implies that your element implementation is deliberately not using the WPF framework-level implementation, and therefore your element must handle layout logic more directly, typically by writing a replacement layout system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的类似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]于 \* 方法上的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 将事件标记为已处理仍然有助于防止调用典型的实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于 \* 方法上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的类似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]于 \* 方法上的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 将事件标记为已处理仍然有助于防止调用典型的实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

summary.span: 获取或设置当 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中呈现时为其整体应用的不透明度因子。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity factor applied to the entire when it is rendered in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 不透明度因子。

span.span: The opacity factor.

value.span: 默认不透明度为 1.0。

span.span: Default opacity is 1.0.

value.span: 值应介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间。

span.span: Expected values are between 0.0 and 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 1.0 默认值是由该类的此依赖项属性的初始元数据提供的默认值。The 1.0 default value is the default provided by the initial metadata of this dependency property on the class. 其他派生类可能会通过在其类构造函数中重写元数据来更改此默认值。Other derived classes may potentially change this default value by overriding the metadata from within their class constructor. 的值不会应用于实际布局, 除非该元素也可见 (为`true`)。The value of won't be applied to actual layout unless the element is also visible ( is `true`). 从元素树向下向下的父元素应用于子元素, 但嵌套的不透明度设置的可见效果不在各个子元素的属性值中指定。 is applied from parent elements on down the element tree to child elements, but the visible effects of the nested opacity settings aren't indicated in the property value of individual child elements. 例如, 如果列表具有 50% (0.5) 的不透明度, 其中一个列表项的不透明度设置为 20% (0.2), 则该列表项的净可见不透明度将呈现为 10% (0.1), 但列表项属性的属性值仍将为 在查询时为0.2。For instance, if a list has a 50% (0.5) opacity and one of its list items has its own opacity set to 20% (0.2), the net visible opacity for that list item will be rendered as if it were 10% (0.1), but the property value of the list item property would still be 0.2 when queried. 即使声明或计算的不透明度为 0, 元素仍参与输入事件和命令, 而且可能可获得焦点。Even if the declared or evaluated opacity is 0, an element still participates in input events and commands, and is potentially focusable. 这种情况可能很有用, 例如, 可以将不透明度零的对象 (如形状) 用于使用透明元素的掩码基础对象。This aspect can be useful, for instance you can use an opacity-zero object (such as a shape) for masking underlying objects with transparent elements. 然后, 不透明度零对象可以处理基础区域的所有输入事件处理。The opacity-zero object can then handle all the input event processing for an underlying area. 但是, 对象`Background`或`Fill`形状的或应设置为一个值, 即使它是, 也不会启用命中测试, 也不会接收任何事件。However, the `Background` or `Fill` of the object or shape should be set to a value, even if it is , otherwise hit testing is not enabled, and no events are received. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
