summary.span: 获取或设置一个作为 实现的不透明蒙板，该蒙板可应用到此元素所呈现内容的任何 Alpha 通道蒙板。

span.span: Gets or sets an opacity mask, as a implementation that is applied to any alpha-channel masking for the rendered content of this element.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 要用于不透明蒙板的画笔。

span.span: The brush to use for opacity masking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅使用 alpha 通道值为提供的。This property only uses whatever the alpha channel value is for the supplied . 呈现的内容 (红色、绿色或蓝色) 的其他通道将被忽略。The other channels of the 's rendered content (Red, Green, or Blue) are ignored. 此目的最常见的是, 可用于各种照片屏蔽技术 (例如 vignette)。The most typical for this purpose is an , which can be used for a variety of photo masking techniques such as a vignette. 但可以使用任何定义的(如)。But any defined (such as ) can be used. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]中, 此属性值可以使用特定于抽象类的每个实现的内联语法。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property value can use an inline syntax that is specific to each implementation of the abstract class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[采用纯色和渐变进行绘制概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 以下标记示例显示了一个应用到另一个的不透明蒙板。The following markup example shows an opacity mask applied to another . [!code-xaml[OpacityMasksSnippet#UIElementOpacityMask](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpacityMasksSnippet/CS/ImageBrushExample.xaml#uielementopacitymask)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯一标识每个元素。 uniquely identifies each element. 每次加载同一个 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素 (包括二进制表示形式) 时, 元素保持不变。An element keeps the same every time the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is loaded (including binary representations). 此标识符用于内部加载、分析和序列化要求。This identifier is used for internal loading, parsing and serialization requirements. 不应由应用程序代码使用。It is not intended to be used by your application code. 此属性与任何给定实例的结果都没有关系。This property has no relationship to the result for any given instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 当焦点在该元素上时松开某个键后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is released while focus is on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键处理与其他平台功能 (如命令和文本撰写) 交互。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 事件是较低级别的文本输入事件, 可能不会在某些控件上按预期方式工作。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 这是因为某些控件具有控件组合或类处理, 可提供较高级别的文本输入处理和相关事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 有关详细信息, 请查看各个控件的文档。For details, check the documentation for individual controls. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewKeyUpEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewKeyUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewLostKeyboardFocus As KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素不再聚焦于键盘时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此事件使用隧道路由, 失去焦点的元素可能是子元素, 而不是实际附加事件处理程序的元素。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据中的, 以确定失去焦点的实际元素。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewLostKeyboardFocusEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下任意鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常与或一起引发, 这对应于按下这两个标准鼠标按钮之一。 The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由事件, 但它们是直接路由事件, 当事件沿事件路由到达此元素时, 将引发相应的按钮特定的事件。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅或 的 "备注"。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)看起来是通过元素树跟踪隧道路由, 但实际上它是直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开基础事件的事件数据。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果标记为 "已处理", 则实质上是为沿着路由的所有其他侦听器以及所有相关事件标记已处理。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成的事件, 例如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针第一次进入元素边界时, 以及当鼠标指针移动到元素边界内时, 将发生此事件。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)看起来是通过元素树跟踪隧道路由, 但实际上它是直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开基础事件的事件数据。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果标记为 "已处理", 则实质上是为沿着路由的所有其他侦听器以及所有相关事件标记已处理。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseRightButtonUpEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseRightButtonUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseUp As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且松开任意鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常与或一起引发, 这对应于按下这两个标准鼠标按钮之一。 The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由事件, 但它们是直接路由事件, 当事件沿事件路由到达此元素时, 将引发相应的按钮特定的事件。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅或 的 "备注"。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseUpEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且用户滚动鼠标滚轮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于鼠标指针所在的位置;因此, 如果从焦点或捕获的元素接收此事件, 则鼠标指针实际上可能位于另一个元素上。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许组件或应用程序以与设备无关的方式侦听文本输入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是的主要方式, 但语音、手写和其他输入设备也可能会生成。 The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 由于键组合 (在默认键盘或通过输入法编辑器) 中, 多个键事件可能只引发一个文本输入事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在手指触摸屏幕并移动之前, 和事件不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 在屏幕上按一根手指并在不移动它的情况下, 将导致的按下和保持行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行为等效于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件在手指触摸屏幕时立即发生, 请将此元素的附加属性设置`false`为。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: 当请求显示光标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每次鼠标指针移至新位置时都会在一个元素上引发此事件，这意味着光标对象可能需要根据其新位置进行更改。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件名称所引用的游标不一定是文本光标 (有时也称为插入点)。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反, 此上下文中的光标是一个对象, 该对象声明与 Windows 编程中几个可能的输入相关设备或概念相关的屏幕图形显示。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 该对象由 WPF 中的类表示。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 输入系统使你可以在其表示鼠标指针的屏幕位置时更改此光标。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 可以从枚举中使用预定义的值, 也可以将自定义游标声明为映像文件。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 侦听事件不是游标管理的有效方法。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反, 每个元素应通过和定义其自己的游标行为。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 只应依赖于是否未使用 WPF 框架级基元素, 或者在基于每个元素定义游标行为的特殊情况下, 不能满足您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 有关实现游标行为以响应的详细信息, 请参阅。 For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 未定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

abstract member RaiseEvent : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.RaiseEvent : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含事件数据并标识要引发的事件。

span.span: A that contains the event data and also identifies the event to raise.

summary.span: 引发特定路由事件。

span.span: Raises a specific routed event.

summary.span: 在提供的 实例内标识将引发的 （作为该事件数据的 属性）。

span.span: The to be raised is identified within the instance that is provided (as the property of that event data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数被类型化为所有路由事件数据的公共基类型; 但是, 应将事件数据指定为可用于引发事件的最特定事件数据类型, 因为派生类包含`e`在引发特定事件时用于特定事件的实际特定数据属性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不只是事件的状态属性;它还标识要引发的路由事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引发模式和路由事件数据都不同于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和数据类, 通常只包含与事件相关的属性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件数据、将事件标识符追加到数据, 然后使用事件数据实例引发自定义路由事件。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#raiseevent)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#raiseevent)]

summary.span: 从此元素中删除指定的路由事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes the specified routed event handler from this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]情况最常见的情况是, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]实现与自定义路由事件相关联的 "包装" 事件, 特别是在为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]级别实现处理程序的 "删除" 逻辑时。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 此备注部分后面的示例演示了这种情况。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果没有向与方法调用的输入参数匹配的条件注册处理程序, 则调用此方法将不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that matches the input parameters for the method call. 如果附加了多个与条件相匹配的处理程序, 则只会删除事件处理程序存储中的第一个处理程序。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行为与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] `-=`运算符的行为一致。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既`routedEvent`不`handler`是也`null`不是。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 尝试提供任何一个值时`null` , 将引发异常。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 此方法将忽略`handledEventsToo`参数信息, 如果处理程序是首次通过签名添加的, 而该签名启用了已处理的事件, 则提供此方法。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 已删除任一类型的处理程序。Either type of handler is removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用作为事件包装器定义的一部分。The following example uses as part of an event wrapper definition. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#addremovehandler)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#addremovehandler)]

summary.span: 获取（或设置）此元素的最终呈现大小。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用的是 WPF 框架级别布局系统, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]请不要尝试在代码中设置此属性。Do not attempt to set this property, either in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or in code, if using the WPF framework-level layout system. 几乎所有典型的应用程序方案都将使用此布局系统。Nearly all typical application scenarios will use this layout system. 布局系统将不会直接遵循属性中设置的大小。The layout system will not respect sizes set in the property directly. 该属性仅声明为可写, 以启用特意避开典型布局协议的某些 WPF 核心级桥接方案, 如对类的支持。The property is declared writable only to enable certain WPF core-level bridging cases that deliberately circumvent the typical layout protocols, such as support for the class. 此属性可用于在布局系统替代 (如或) 内检查适用的呈现大小。This property can be used for checking the applicable render size within layout system overrides such as or . 更常见的情况是处理具有类处理程序重写或事件的事件。A more common scenario is handling the event with the class handler override or the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示自定义装饰器如何使用值来创建定义装饰器的矩形图形并调整其大小, 作为其实现的一部分。The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the value in order to create and size the rectangle graphic that defines the adorner, as part of its implementation. [!code-csharp[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementdesiredsize)] [!code-vb[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#uielementdesiredsize)]

summary.span: 获取或设置影响此元素的呈现位置的转换信息。

span.span: Gets or sets transform information that affects the rendering position of this element.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 描述所需呈现转换的细节。

span.span: Describes the specifics of the desired render transform.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现转换不会重新生成布局大小或呈现大小信息。A render transform does not regenerate layout size or render size information. 呈现转换通常用于对元素进行动画处理或应用临时效果。Render transforms are typically intended for animating or applying a temporary effect to an element. 例如, 元素可能会在聚焦或鼠标指针置于的情况下进行缩放, 或可能在负载上抖动以便将眼睛绘制到的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]那一部分。For example, the element might zoom when focused or moused over, or might jitter on load to draw the eye to that part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 获取或设置由 声明的任何可能呈现转换的中心点，相对于元素的边界。

span.span: Gets or sets the center point of any possible render transform declared by , relative to the bounds of the element.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 声明呈现转换的值。

span.span: The value that declares the render transform.

value.span: 默认值是一个坐标为 (0,0) 的 。

span.span: The default value is a with coordinates (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对结构值的使用有点非标准, 因为在坐标系统中不表示绝对位置。 has a somewhat nonstandard use of the structure value, in that the does not represent an absolute location in a coordinate system. 相反, 介于0和1之间的值被解释为每个 x, y 轴中当前元素的范围的因子。Instead, values between 0 and 1 are interpreted as a factor for the range of the current element in each x,y axis. 例如, (0.5, 0.5) 将导致在元素上居中呈现转换, 或者 (1, 1) 将呈现转换放置在元素的右下角。For example, (0.5,0.5) will cause the render transform to be centered on the element, or (1,1) would place the render transform at the bottom right corner of the element. 不是接受的值。 is not an accepted value. 还将接受0和1之外的值, 并将导致更非常规的转换效果。Values beyond 0 and 1 are also accepted, and will result in more unconventional transform effects. 例如, 如果将设置为 (5, 5), 然后应用, 则旋转点将在元素本身的边界之外。For instance, if you set to be (5,5), and then apply a , the rotation point will be well outside the bounds of the element itself. 该转换将使元素围绕在右下方的大圆中旋转。The transform will spin your element around in a big circle that originates beyond bottom right. 原点可能位于其父元素内的某个位置, 可能可能会超出框架或视图。The origin might be somewhere inside its parent element and could possibly be possibly out of frame or view. 负点值类似, 它们将超出左上边界。Negative point values are similar, these will go beyond the top left bounds. 呈现转换不影响布局, 通常用于对元素进行动画或应用临时效果。Render transforms do not affect layout, and are typically used to animate or apply a temporary effect to an element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *xOrigin**xOrigin* 水平原点系数。The horizontal origin factor. 通常将此值指定为0和1之间的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. *yOrigin**yOrigin* 垂直原点系数。The vertical origin factor. 通常将此值指定为0和1之间的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例在代码中生成元素, 应用, 然后应用。The following example builds up elements in code, applies a , and then applies a . summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在呈现过程中，此元素的呈现是否应使用特定于设备的像素设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether rendering for this element should use device-specific pixel settings during rendering.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果元素应按照设备像素呈现，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element should render in accordance to device pixels; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 上声明的默认值为 。

span.span: The default as declared on is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在根元素上将`true`此属性设置为, 以在 UI 中启用像素对齐呈现。You can set this property to `true` on your root element to enable pixel snap rendering throughout the UI. 对于在大于 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)]的设备上运行的设备, 像素对齐呈现可以最大程度地减少单单元实线附近的抗锯齿视觉对象。For devices operating at greater than 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)], pixel snap rendering can minimize anti-aliasing visual artifacts in the vicinity of single-unit solid lines. 当由或任何可能的派生类继承时, 将重写此依赖项属性的元数据, `true`以将元数据属性设置为。When inherited by or any possible derived classes, overrides the metadata for this dependency property to set the metadata property to `true`. 这样做的结果是, 子树中只有最外面的元素需要将`true`指定为, 然后该子树的所有子元素将报告`true`为, 并将具有视觉效果。What this achieves is that only the outermost element in a subtree needs to specify as `true`, and all child elements of that subtree will then report as `true` and will have the visual effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

related.span: WPF 应用程序中的像素对齐

span.span: Pixel Snapping in WPF Applications

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StylusEnter As StylusEventHandler

summary.span: 在触笔进入此元素的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是使用直接事件处理路由策略的[路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。 is a [routed event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由事件不沿路由引发;相反, 它们是在引发它们的同一元素中进行处理的。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是, 它们会启用路由事件行为的其他方面, 如样式中的事件触发器。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管在触笔进入元素边界时进行跟踪, 但此事件更确切地报告此元素上的属性值`false`已`true`从更改为。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、鼠标和触笔输入在特定关系中存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly StylusEnterEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填充此集合的控件的一个示例是。An example of a control that populates this collection is . 将添加为集合项, 这使可以与触笔输入交互, 并在响应触笔驱动事件时生成唯一的呈现。 adds the as a collection item, which enables the to interact with stylus input and produce the unique rendering in response to stylus driven events. 有关创建可接收和解释触笔输入的自定义插件的信息, 请参阅[截获触笔输入](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md)。For information on creating custom plug-ins that can receive and interpret stylus input, see [Intercepting Input from the Stylus](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实例, 并将其添加到自定义墨迹处理控件的集合中。The following example creates a instance and adds it to the collection for a custom ink handling control. span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已标记为由复合控件的内部实现进行处理。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 请参阅下面的注释。See Remark below. 事件可能已标记为由复合控件的内部实现进行处理。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如, 是一个复合控件, 其中的事件已标记为已处理, 在其组合中。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 控件这样做的原因是, 控件需要解释某些类型的输入 (如箭头键), 以便对该控件具有特殊意义。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果将用作文本输入处理程序的事件, 可能会获得更好的结果。 If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 此方法可避免控件组合已将此事件标记为已处理并防止处理程序通过事件路由接收事件的大多数情况。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件允许组件或应用程序以与设备无关的方式侦听文本输入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是的主要方法, 但语音、手写和其他输入设备也可能会引发。 The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 由于键组合 (在默认键盘或通过输入法编辑器) 中, 多个键事件可能只引发一个文本输入事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 当悬停在此元素上方的手指触摸屏幕时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在手指触摸屏幕并移动之前, 和事件不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 在屏幕上按一根手指并在不移动它的情况下, 将导致的按下和保持行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行为等效于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件在手指触摸屏幕时立即发生, 请将此元素的附加属性设置`false`为。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point TranslatePoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, class System.Windows.UIElement relativeTo) cil managed
public: System::Windows::Point TranslatePoint(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::UIElement ^ relativeTo);

span.span: The point value, as relative to this element.
The element to translate the given point into.

summary.span: 将相对于此元素的点转换为相对于指定元素的坐标。

span.span: Translates a point relative to this element to coordinates that are relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 相对于目标元素而不是此源元素的点值。

span.span: A point value, now relative to the target element rather than this source element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许传递`null` , 并指示坐标应相对于此元素所属的逻辑树中的根元素。 `relativeTo`Passing `null` for `relativeTo` is permitted, and indicates that coordinates should be relative to the root element in the logical tree that this element belongs to. 此方法用于转换命中测试点值。This method is used for translating hit test point values. 如果正在创作控件并且需要在较低级别处理输入, 则调用此方法主要是相关的。Calling this method is mainly relevant if you are authoring a control and need to process input at a lower level. 如果使用的是现有控件, 通常可以假定已完成的控件将报告正确转换的命中测试结果。If you are using existing controls, you can generally assume that completed controls will report correctly translated hit test results.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 请确保此元素的所有可视子元素都正确地进行了布局更新。

span.span: Ensures that all visual child elements of this element are properly updated for layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时 , 具有`false`或 `false`的元素将调用元素特定的和方法, 这会强制执行布局更新, 并验证所有计算的大小。When you call this method, elements with `false` or `false` will call element-specific and methods, which forces layout update, and all computed sizes will be validated. 如果布局没有变化, 或者布局的排列和度量状态均无效, 则调用此方法将不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if layout is unchanged, or if neither arrangement nor measurement state of a layout is invalid. 但是, 如果布局在任何一个方面无效, 则调用将重做整个布局。However, if layout is invalid in either respect, the call will redo the entire layout. 因此, 应避免在元素树中的每次增量更改和次要更改之后调用。Therefore, you should avoid calling after each incremental and minor change in the element tree. 布局系统将使用一种算法来以延迟方式执行元素布局, 并使用一种算法来平衡性能和货币, 并使用加权策略来将更改延迟到所有子元素有效。The layout system will perform element layout in a deferred manner, using an algorithm that balances performance and currency, and with a weighting strategy to defer changes to roots until all child elements are valid. 仅当你确实需要更新的大小和位置, 并且仅在你确定控制和可能影响布局的所有属性更改完成后, 才应调用。You should only call if you absolutely need updated sizes and positions, and only after you are certain that all changes to properties that you control and that may affect layout are completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将影响的值, 而这又可能引发事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 但是, 有其他影响它的因素, 例如, 包含它的父级的可见性设置。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 不参与输入事件(或命令)的元素不影响布局的度量值或排列处理方式,不在选项卡序列中,也不会在命中测试中报告。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the Measure or Arrange passes of layout, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 当通过或其派生类继承时 , 将此属性的默认值重定义为。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be . 这会影响未对初始创建的布局运行度量值处理, 并返回 (0, 0)。This has the effect of not running the Measure pass of layout on an initially created , and returns (0,0). 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . 还将默认值重新定义为, 并为及其派生类生成类似的结果行为。 also redefines the default value to be , with similar resulting behavior for and its derived classes. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例实现了一个处理程序, 该处理程序引用了两个不同的命名按钮, 它们分别是用户界面中的互斥对。The following example implements a handler that references two different named buttons that are intended to be a mutually exclusive pair in the user interface. 在运行与该按钮关联的实际程序逻辑之前, 按钮本身设置为, 并且对中的另一个按钮设置为。 Prior to running the actual program logic associated with the button, the button itself is set to be , and the other button in the pair is set to . [!code-csharp[MediaElement_snip#UIElementVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaElement_snip/CSharp/PlaybackExample.cs#uielementvisibility)] [!code-vb[MediaElement_snip#UIElementVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaElement_snip/VB/PlaybackExample.vb#uielementvisibility)]
